Operation.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName="Bionic"] [defName="PowerArm" or defName="PowerClaw" or defName="BionicArm" or defName="BionicHand" or defName="BionicLeg" or defName="BionicFoot"]
/Defs/HediffDef[@ParentName="addedPartBionics"] [defName="PowerArm" or defName="PowerClaw" or defName="BionicArm" or defName="BionicHand" or defName="BionicLeg" or defName="BionicFoot"]

/Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="SurgeryBionic"] [defName="InstallPowerArm" or defName="InstallPowerClaw" or defName="InstallBionicArm" or defName="InstallBionicHand" or defName="InstallBionicLeg" or defName="InstallBionicFoot"]

/Defs/ThingDef[@ParentName="Advanced"] [defName="AdvancedPowerArm" or defName="AdvancedPowerClaw" or defName="AdvancedBionicArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicHand" or defName="AdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="AdvancedBionicFoot"]

/Defs/HediffDef[@ParentName="addedPartAdvanced"] [defName="AdvancedPowerArm" or defName="AdvancedPowerClaw" or defName="AdvancedBionicArm" or defName="AdvancedBionicHand" or defName="AdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="AdvancedBionicFoot"]

/Defs/RecipeDef[@ParentName="SurgeryAdvanced"] [defName="InstallAdvancedPowerArm" or defName="InstallAdvancedPowerClaw" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicArm" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicHand" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicLeg" or defName="InstallAdvancedBionicFoot"]
